GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v6.0.7
GSD.description:
x86/fpu: Fix copy_xstate_to_uabi() to copy init states correctly

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.7 by commit 6ff29642fd28965a8f8d6d326ac91bf6075f3113, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit 2308ee57d93d896618dd65c996429c9d3e469fe0. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: x86/fpu: Fix copy_xstate_to_uabi() to copy init states correctly
